topic.title: Adding Libraries to the Built-in FO Processor (XML with XSLT and FO)

section.title: Adding Hyphenation Support for XML with XSLT Transformation Scenarios
section.p: You can extend the functionality of the built-in FO processor by dropping additional libraries in the /lib/fop directory.

To add support for hyphenation, follow these steps:
Create a folder called fop in the /lib folder.
Download the compiled JAR from OFFO.
Copy the fop-hyph.jar file into the /lib/fop folder.
Restart .

section.title: Adding Support for PDF Images
section.p:
To add support for PDF images, follow these steps:
Create a folder called fop in the /lib folder.
Download the fop-pdf-images JAR libraries.
Copy the libraries into the /lib/fop folder.
Restart .
